description: Disconnects all connections using a specified user ID from a room. This replicates the DisconnectUser WebSocket operation in the Amazon IVS Chat Messaging API.

parameters.name: roomIdentifier
parameters.description: Identifier of the room from which the user's clients should be disconnected. Currently this must be an ARN.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user (connection) to disconnect from the room.
